flexibleContent.heading: Techtic has earned a reputation as an unrivaled on-demand app development company because of the quality of on-demand apps it has developed for diverse industries.

contentLists.heading: Groceries Delivery Solutions
contentLists.content: Want to remove the grocery shopping hassle with a mobile app? Take advantage of our on-demand delivery app development expertise to create a simple yet attractive grocery delivery app.

contentLists.heading: Content On-Demand Solutions
contentLists.content: Offer a satisfying experience to your customers by building a high-performing, feature-rich on-demand content app that provides access to the latest movies and videos smoothly.

contentLists.heading: Transportation On-Demand
contentLists.content: Techtic offers the best-in-class app solution for transport and logistics businesses with advanced features, such as route optimization, real-time tracking, fleet management, and more.

contentLists.heading: Salons and Barbers On-Demand
contentLists.content: Take your beauty salon to the next level with our on-demand app development solution and optimize your salon operations along with sales and the number of customers.

contentLists.heading: Why should I choose Techtic for On-Demand Delivery App Development?
contentLists.content:
You can choose Techtic for On-Demand Delivery App Development because:

  • Highly experienced On-Demand Delivery App developers
  • 24*7 Robust supports team
  • Deliver project on time and within budget
  • Agile Development Process
  • Transparent communication and development process
  • Good testimonials and client reviews
  • Excellent coding standards
  • Customer-centric Approach
  • Result-oriented strategies
  • Easy Scalability Options
  • Developer replacement guarantee
  • Strict NDA terms & IP security
  • Client Success Manager

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for On-Demand Delivery App Development?
contentLists.content: We offer a fixed time/price model or fixed dedicated resource model for your On-Demand Delivery App Development. You can choose a hiring model as per your project requirement.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use to track my On-Demand Delivery App project?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and track every phase of the On-Demand Delivery App. We provide you build of an on-Demand Delivery App in every sprint of the On-Demand app. Project Management Tools are:

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: What steps are followed for the On-Demand Delivery App development process by your company?
contentLists.content:
Our On-Demand Delivery app development process:

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation.
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming & Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: Do I own the ownership and the code of my On-Demand Delivery App?
contentLists.content: Yes, we will give you code ownership after the development of the On-Demand Delivery App project. However, in some cases, depending on the NDA terms, then we claim ownership.

contentLists.heading: Can you list some of your developed On-Demand Delivery App?
contentLists.content: In our 11+ year’s experience, we design and developed 150+ Apps. You can view all our App Development projects in our Portfolio section.

contentLists.heading: Do you provide NDA signed document before going for an on-demand app development project?
contentLists.content: Yes, we do. You will get a signed NDA document.

contentLists.heading: Do you provide maintenance and support after developing an on-demand delivery app?
contentLists.content: Yes, of course. Our on-demand delivery app development team is always ready to provide maintenance and support services for your on-demand delivery application at very pocket-friendly rates.

contentLists.heading: Is your on demand solution custom or prebuilt?
contentLists.content: Techtic Solutions possess a lot of experience in building on-demand solutions. Our experience will definitely be useful to build your solution, however, we don’t reuse the code of our customers and hence, we only build completely custom solutions to fit your requirements, with cutting-edge technology and the best design thinking process.

contentLists.heading: Do you have an estimated timeline & price for my solution?
contentLists.content: We require you to provide us with your complete requirements, or we can hop on a FREE discovery call with you to identify how much would a solution cost you and what the average timeline are we looking at is in order to give you a perfectly working solution. Feel free to send us your contact information and our representative will contact you.
